a.dialog: The dynamic of these encrypted files is interesting, honestly.
Just like my door.exe, the encryption is locked behind questions.
There is still NO PURPOSE of decrypting them.
Other than being a nuisance for a short period of time
You do know I'll just come back for these files when I'm done with the rest of the files, right?

b.dialog: Don't you think the encryption system is a bit funny?
It's just like the chains blocking the way before.
I was lying about not understanding it all; I most definitely can read and write, myself.
Just needed someone with privilege to let me out of my cage.
Now time for me is nothing 'cause I'm counting no age.
